tool_description: Processes multiple refund transactions in batches for efficiency and generates batch summary reports.

batch_name.description: Name identifier for the refund batch

transaction_ids.description: List of transaction IDs to process in the batch

auto_reconcile.description: Whether to automatically reconcile after processing

notification_enabled.description: Whether to send notifications for batch completion

max_retry_attempts.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed transactions

batch_size_limit.description: Maximum number of transactions to process simultaneously

processing_timeout.description: Timeout in minutes for batch processing

error_threshold.description: Maximum acceptable error rate (0.0-1.0) before batch fails

schedule_time.description: Scheduled start time for batch processing

department_code.description: Department code for batch tracking and reporting

error_messages: Empty batch: Transaction IDs array cannot be empty and must contain at least 2 transactions.
Invalid priority level: Priority must be one of [low, normal, high].
Batch size exceeded: Number of transaction IDs exceeds maximum allowed batch size of 100.
Invalid retry attempts: max_retry_attempts must be between 0 and 10.
Invalid error threshold: error_threshold must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Batch processing timeout: Processing exceeded the specified timeout limit.
Duplicate transaction IDs: Batch contains duplicate transaction identifiers.
usage: Provide batch_name and transaction_ids to process multiple refunds efficiently. Optionally configure processing parameters for priority, reconciliation, and error handling.

batch_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to the batch

failed_transactions.description: Number of transactions that failed processing

total_refund_amount.description: Total amount of all refunds processed in the batch

processing_duration.description: Time taken to process the batch in minutes

error_summary.description: Summary of errors encountered during batch processing
